title: Home - American AVK
snippet: Valves and fire hydrants from American AVK lead the industry in quality and service, guaranteed. From our 10-year warranty on valves and hydrants to our next-day parts delivery guarantee, we back every product with exceptional support.

title: AVK Fasteners | Home
snippet: AVK Fasteners is the market leader in blind threaded inserts and studs. AVK is dedicated to improving the way we assemble the world.

title: Advent Convertible and Income Fund (AVK)
snippet: Find the latest Advent Convertible and Income Fund (AVK) stock quote, history, news and other vital information to help you with your stock trading and investing.

title: Quality valve solutions for drinking water, wastewater, gas supply and ...
snippet: The AVK Group is a privately owned industrial group currently comprising +100 companies worldwide. We develop and produce valves, hydrants and accessories for water and gas distribution, sewage treatment and fire protection.

title: Manufacturer of valves, hydrants and accessories - AVK International
snippet: AVK is a global leader within high-quality valves and hydrants for water, wastewater, gas and fire protection. Our products and solutions are part of vital infrastructures that minimise water loss and improve quality of life for people everywhere.
